meta.title: Books - Global Governance Frameworks
meta.description: Explore our comprehensive collection of books that provide the philosophical and practical foundations for regenerative global governance and conscious technological development.

hero.title: Books
hero.subtitle: Foundational Works for Planetary Governance
hero.description: Dive deep into the books that explore the principles, methodologies, and practical applications of regenerative governance, conscious AI development, and systems transformation for a thriving world.

jordensForvaltare.title: Jordens FÃ¶rvaltare
jordensForvaltare.description: Currently available in Swedish. More than a book, this is a strategic briefing for the architects of the next societal model. It serves as the foundational 'White Paper' for the Global Governance Frameworks initiative, outlining the technical and ethical infrastructure required to move from extraction to stewardship. A recruiting tool for the builders of the Open Hand.

ai.title: AI as Catalyst for Cognitive Evolution: From Fragmentation to Integration in the Age of AI
ai.description: This book explores how humanity can consciously partner with artificial intelligence, using it as a 'cognitive scaffold' to accelerate the leap from the fragmented 'Tier 1' thinking that drives the polycrisis to the integrated 'Tier 2' consciousness required for a flourishing future.

radicalCompetence.title: Radical Competence: Strategic Activism for the Systems-Thinking Age
radicalCompetence.description: A practical guide for Green-stage activists ready to develop Yellow-level strategic thinking and build campaigns that actually work. Includes templates for power mapping, integration assessment, and municipal organizing.

integrationCrisis.title: The Integration Crisis: Yellow Solutions to Orange Problems
integrationCrisis.description: A comprehensive framework for understanding fragmentation and building systems that support whole human beings across biological, cognitive, emotional, behavioral, social, and spiritual dimensions.

globalGovernance.title: Global Governance: Natural Steps Toward a Thriving World
globalGovernance.description: A practical roadmap for creating an ethical, decentralized global governance system that can address planetary-scale challenges through systems thinking, cutting-edge technology, and deep human wisdom.

aubi.title: Adaptive Universal Basic Income: A New Social Contract for the 21st Century
aubi.description: A comprehensive framework for reimagining economic security that responds dynamically to individual needs while encouraging meaningful societal contributions, offering practical implementation strategies at local, national, and global scales.

capitalWeaver.title: The Capital Weaver: A Practical Guide to Regenerative Investing
capitalWeaver.description: A comprehensive toolkit for investors ready to align their capital with regenerative transformation. Learn the five principles of regenerative investing, master the scorecard methodology, and discover how to build portfolios that create wealth through healing rather than extraction.

optimizingReality.title: Optimizing Reality: A Systems Thinking Guide For a Multi Intelligence Future
optimizingReality.description: An actionable blueprint for integrating human, artificial, ecological, and collective intelligence to create more harmonious and sustainable systems across governance, economics, and environmental stewardship.

realitySovereignty.title: Reality, Sovereignty, and Consciousness: The Quest for Cognitive Liberty
realitySovereignty.description: An exploration of who owns your mind, examining the intersection of personal freedom, consciousness exploration, and societal transformation while offering frameworks for responsible exploration and policy reform.

regenerativeReciprocity.title: Regenerative Reciprocity: Systems, Spirituality, and the Ethics of Sustenance in a Diverse World
regenerativeReciprocity.description: A book about reconnecting humans with nature and each other through a framework that combines systems thinking, spiritual wisdom, and practical action, showing how we can shift from extractive to regenerative ways of living that honor the interconnectedness of all life.

lmci.title: Love, Meaning, Connection: A New Index for Measuring What Matters
lmci.description: A revolutionary guide that challenges traditional economic metrics by introducing a framework to measure human flourishing through our deepest relationships, sense of purpose, and connections to ourselves, others, and the world around us.

being.title: Being: A Tapestry of Existence Through Systems and Poetry
being.description: A book exploring what it means to exist through both systems thinking and poetic experience, weaving together philosophy, science, and spirituality to understand the interconnected yet deeply personal nature of being.
